mapper.select: SELECT device.`id` AS deviceId, device.serialno AS deviceSerialno, device.`name` AS deviceName, device.`model` AS deviceModel, device.`site` AS deciceSite, repairevent.`id` AS reventId, repairevent.`work_orderNo` AS workOrderNo, repairevent.`plan_time` AS planTime, repairevent.`content` AS reventConent, dics.`value` AS reventStatusValue, dics.`id` AS reventStatusId, dics.`name` AS reventStatusName, dicl.`value` AS reventLevelValue, dicl.`id` AS reventLevelId, dicl.`name` AS reventLevelName, dict.`value` AS reventTypeValue, dict.`id` AS reventTypeId, dict.`name` AS reventTypeName, dicdt.`value` AS deviceTypeValue, dicdt.`id` AS deviceTypeId, dicdt.`name` AS deviceTypeName, createuser.`name` AS createUserName, createuser.`user_id` AS createUserId, IFNULL(helddept.`name`,dept.`name`) AS engineerDeptName, IFNULL(helddept.`dept_id`,dept.`dept_id`) AS engineerDeptId, IFNULL(helduser.`name`,engineeruser.`name`) AS engineerUserName, IFNULL(helduser.`user_id`,engineeruser.`user_id`) AS engineerUserId, repairevent.`create_time` AS createTime FROM cus_repair_event repairevent LEFT JOIN view_repair_held_person heldemployee ON heldemployee.task_id=repairevent.id LEFT JOIN sys_user helduser ON helduser.`user_id`=heldemployee.`held_person` LEFT JOIN sys_dept helddept ON helddept.dept_id=helduser.dept_id LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary dics ON dics.`id`=repairevent.`status` LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary dict ON dict.`id`=repairevent.`type` LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary dicl ON dicl.`id`=repairevent.`level` LEFT JOIN cus_device device ON device.`id`=repairevent.`device_id` LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary dicdt ON dicdt.`id`=device.`type` LEFT JOIN sys_user createuser ON createuser.`user_id`=repairevent.`create_by` LEFT JOIN sys_user engineeruser ON engineeruser.`user_id`=repairevent.`engineer_id` LEFT JOIN sys_dept dept ON dept.dept_id=engineeruser.dept_id where repairevent.id = #{value}

SELECT device.`id` AS deviceId, device.serialno AS deviceSerialno, device.`name` AS deviceName, device.`model` AS deviceModel, repairevent.`id` AS reventId, repairevent.`work_orderNo` AS workOrderNo, dics.`id` AS reventStatusId, dics.`name` AS reventStatusName, dicl.`id` AS reventLevelId, dicl.`name` AS reventLevelName, dict.`id` AS reventTypeId, dict.`name` AS reventTypeName, createuser.`name` AS createUserName, createuser.`user_id` AS createUserId, IFNULL(helddept.`name`,dept.`name`) AS engineerDeptName, IFNULL(helddept.`dept_id`,dept.`dept_id`) AS engineerDeptId, IFNULL(helduser.`name`,engineeruser.`name`) AS engineerUserName, IFNULL(helduser.`user_id`,engineeruser.`user_id`) AS engineerUserId, repairevent.`plan_time` AS planTime, repairevent.`create_time` AS createTime FROM cus_repair_event repairevent LEFT JOIN view_repair_held_person heldemployee ON heldemployee.task_id=repairevent.id LEFT JOIN sys_user helduser ON helduser.`user_id`=heldemployee.`held_person` LEFT JOIN sys_dept helddept ON helddept.dept_id=helduser.dept_id LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary dics ON dics.`id`=repairevent.`status` LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary dict ON dict.`id`=repairevent.`type` LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary dicl ON dicl.`id`=repairevent.`level` LEFT JOIN cus_device device ON device.`id`=repairevent.`device_id` LEFT JOIN sys_user engineeruser ON engineeruser.`user_id`=repairevent.`engineer_id` LEFT JOIN sys_dept dept ON dept.dept_id=engineeruser.dept_id LEFT JOIN sys_user createuser ON createuser.`user_id`=repairevent.`create_by` LEFT JOIN sys_dept createdept ON createdept.`dept_id`=createuser.`dept_id` LEFT JOIN view_repair_cc_person ccperson ON ccperson.task_id = repairevent.id LEFT JOIN view_repair_held_persons heldemployees ON heldemployees.task_id=repairevent.id
and repairevent.id = #{id} and repairevent.work_orderNo = #{workOrderno} and repairevent.type = #{type} and repairevent.level = #{level} and repairevent.usage = #{usage} and IFNULL(helduser.`user_id`,engineeruser.`user_id`) = #{engineerId} and repairevent.status = #{status} and repairevent.status = #{singleStatus} and repairevent.device_id = #{deviceId} and repairevent.create_by = #{createBy} and repairevent.create_time = #{createTime} and repairevent.parent_id = #{parentId} and repairevent.parent_type = #{parentType} and repairevent.del_flag = #{delFlag} and DATE_FORMAT(repairevent.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(repairevent.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and createdept.`id_path` LIKE CONCAT(#{deptId},'%') and IFNULL(helddept.`dept_id`,dept.`dept_id`) = #{deptIdQuery} and (repairevent.`create_by`=#{userId} OR (repairevent.`engineer_id`=#{userId} OR ccperson.`cc_person` LIKE CONCAT(#{ccperson},'%') OR heldemployees.`held_persons` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT(',',#{userId}),',%') AND repairevent.status <> 146)) and CONCAT(device.name,device.serialno) LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{divceName},'%'))
and (repairevent.status=56 OR repairevent.status=57)
ORDER BY IF(repairevent.status=146,0,1),${sort} ${order},repairevent.status ASC,repairevent.`plan_time` ASC,repairevent.`level` ASC,repairevent.id DESC
ORDER BY repairevent.`plan_time` ASC,repairevent.`level` ASC,repairevent.id DESC
ORDER BY IF(repairevent.status=146,0,1),repairevent.status ASC,repairevent.`plan_time` ASC,repairevent.`level` ASC,repairevent.id DESC
limit #{offset}, #{limit}
